documents.document: @VikkiRossWrites thanks Vikki!
@CmonHarris Glad you’re in on this, Harry.
@nisummers They’re particularly good today. Not sure why. Not complaining either.
@paddyduke "You’ll need to contact our UK team about this" …How about *you* forward this to them? (That was pretty much my reply)
Building an ebooks bot of myself is the best work I’ve ever done. No shame. https://t.co/sHG6VYxziB
@nisummers Sometimes this thing really does spit out some gems, doesn’t it?
Mighty looking forward to tonight’s #copywritersunite #Edinburgh drinks. I’m new around here, so make me feel welcome, please?
@paddyduke Once emailed their support using the in-app option. It routed my query to their US team…apparently my fault?
@CmonHarris YEP
Rapping, deconstructed: The best rhymers of all time. @voxdotcom do the best explainers. I loved this. https://t.co/Qh78otxhmD
MUTE 👏🏻 YOUR 👏🏻 PHONE 👏🏻 WHEN 👏🏻 WEARING 👏🏻 HEADPHONES 👏🏻 ON 👏🏻 THE 👏🏻 TRAIN
@hellojess Lighter glasses! For reals.
Hugely proud to work on this and to pick up the award last night! https://t.co/KeQJAAbzX2 #BrandImpactAwards https://t.co/7j3BC7gKMu
Did anyone else think the iWork segment in last night’s #AppleEvent was a little out of place? I mean, it was cool, but…
RT @Apple: Missed our big launch news? Here it is in 107 seconds. Don't blink. https://t.co/zCdx8oDwgg
@hellojess Yeah, they’ve nailed it with that! Although they did accidentally tweet the iPhone 7 announcement early. 🙊
This is easily the worst slide design I’ve ever seen from Apple in a Keynote. #AppleEvent https://t.co/DAwoO6cikU
Okay — the AirPods actually look like the future and everything. #AppleEvent
JONY’S BACK. IT’S BEEN SO LONG JONY. I’VE MISSED YOU. #AppleEvent
RT @mgsiegler: "That's a lot of nits." Line of the keynote, so far. #AppleEvent
"Yes it’s a Pikachu!" said no-one that’s ever hatched an egg ever.
TBF, they’ve done something pretty great there, haven’t they?
WOAH THERE. MARIO. #AppleEvent
Oops. That’s a little premature. https://t.co/FFVb0DraWc
@nisummers I reckon he left ages ago. It’s all AI and his voice being modelled for announcements.
@iCreateMagazine @nisummers @MartynLandi Martyn, Martyn, give us a clue. Martyn give us a clue.
@iCreateMagazine @nisummers Are we playing 'Spot @MartynLandi on the live stream' again or what?
@nisummers Jees, I haven’t done a keynote in a while. Remember when it was just Eddie Cue’s iPod shuffle?
@MartynLandi Macs on stage, so at least a brief Sierra demo, I guess?
@hellojess Ha, someone else said this! I kinda lucked out, I think. It’s looking a little more grey today, mind.
RT @rosshami: Strong URL work from @TechCrunch. It was the top Google hit too. https://t.co/pMrVZ36bkQ
@MartynLandi @Stephen_Ashby @philipmorris8 But what about this? https://t.co/vVdD58GOqZ
RT @mattgemmell: Keynote tip: remember to tweet exactly what everyone else in the world can already see, hear, and read too, to make timeli…
Keep forgetting to post this: the view from my new office is AWESOME. https://t.co/PPMzLs9Oru
@LukesBeard Montpelier’s is excellent and varied. La Favourite does great pizza.
Working a couple of doors down from @leith_relish is the tastiest thing about Edinburgh so far.
When your Twitter bot just gets you. https://t.co/pP7dAlzibJ
@kaibrach Pretty sure purecss.io offers this?
@Stephen_Ashby @philipmorris8 @MartynLandi That’s Hair Force Two if I ever did see it.
@MartynLandi Also, forget Carpool Karaoke, I bet LadPad Reviews could become a great  Music exclusive.
@MartynLandi @Stephen_Ashby @philipmorris8 (We should all be tweeting FOR Apple)
@MartynLandi CC: @Stephen_Ashby, @philipmorris8
@MartynLandi They’ll never be as good as us, Martyn. They’ll never be as good as us.
@MartynLandi This is a weird thing, but you can totally do it with an ad account.
Massively happy that this is happening just as I’ve moved up here. https://t.co/UwsMnA6HTA
@RobThez Is this an instant block? I feel like it’s close… https://t.co/ojw8pmb6Nn
@RobThez …with a Minion next to it.
@MartynLandi @Stephen_Ashby I just feel bad for @JParsons87 in all of this.
Easily the best thing my bot has said yet. Easily. https://t.co/qYo1Mody4i
@iamsamnorman agreed!
@Mageestbakery I miss you already!
So…now I officially live in Edinburgh, what’s good up here to do/see/drink/eat? Is there anyone I know on Twitter that I don’t know IRL?
Scarily accurate. https://t.co/pIOzUH8U6E
I think my bot has just come up with season three… https://t.co/flPXCFId6Q
After a six-hour drive from Edinburgh to Northampton yesterday, I’m doing the whole thing in reverse today and moving in to my new place! 🎉🏠
This is scarily accurate. https://t.co/n47ykMyen6
@walshpjames Perfect timing — I’ve just moved up here!
.@kaibrach has done awesome stuff with @offscreenmag. Looking forward to what’s next. https://t.co/WuzhAzyrag
@RobThez Plus you actually know about Python and command line, so I reckon it’ll take you even less than the 20 minutes it took me.
@RobThez All I’m saying is, if you did this, I would follow: https://t.co/diawiObu0l
This bot is getting scarily accurate already. https://t.co/p2b4lLxSds
@phillipcaudell I had this. Changed it. Changed it back to the original code the following day. No warning. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
@CmonHarris Nah fuck that. Just no man. Not on.
@RobThez Wow. That’s it. We’re done. Someone unplug the internet.

RT @crewlabs: Supporting other people in your field does not lessen your success.
TL;DR: Be nice. https://t.co/FExbGFFGwe
.@sethgodin nails it once again with Demand guardrails. A solid, Sunday short-read. https://t.co/lZlLHb1BKA https://t.co/VFBJEAj0E9
@xohelloimclaire ugh, this annoys me. Sorry you had a shit time with that!
Ugh. This just isn’t cool. Have a word with yourselves. https://t.co/vLPtc76SR5
#NowPlaying Alright by Keaton Henson and oh wow oh wow oh wow this is beautiful, isn't it? ♫ https://t.co/8R0kowwnot
…thus cementing a long-held belief that bourbons are the best biscuits. FIGHT ME.
TIL that Bourbons were the first biscuits consumed on the moon: https://t.co/8rSL8UCdMT (h/t @gilest)
Put together a 3-hour @Spotify playlist for next week’s move to Edinburgh, but Another Travelin’ Song on repeat could also work, right?
@RobThez Oh I could tell you some stories from my time working at one of those places, Rob. I’ve seen shit, man. I’ve seen shit.
@CmonHarris WELL this is a day of discoveries
@CmonHarris Feel like you’d be a fan of https://t.co/7QZKZ7S1TQ
@fernlzbth WOAH WOAH WOAH WOAH WOAH WOAH WOAH WOAH WOAH WOAH WO
@nisummers I noticed this as well today…feels like they need to tweak the algorithm a little.
@hellojess WOAH THERE
Also works with: The instrumental to Wu-Tang Clan’s Still Grimey https://t.co/SEPwZ5VNkr
Today so far; Pros: @ComputerArts retweeted me. Cons: There was a typo in that tweet. 🙃
@MartynLandi I’m not sure how he could parody the farce that it is!
@MartynLandi It’s just one long episode where someone jokingly proposed leaving the EU as a policy and then it actually happened.
#accidentaltucker cc/ @MartynLandi https://t.co/4vsPIUkaC4
@CmonHarris I think you’ve been adopted by the coffee shops of Edinburgh, m8.
I gave Harry a really unhelpful answer to this earlier. He deserves better. Please help him out. https://t.co/6nukKPpkJo
@CmonHarris Pls give me full reviews real soon. And look out for me as I walk past yr street every morning on the way to the office.
Now back to whatever I normally tweet about…
Finally, if you’ve been close enough to me to have listened to me panicking about the freelance rollercoaster. Thanks for being a pal. ❤️
Secondly, I wouldn’t have made a year without @inspiredAUB @BondandCoyne @SimonPride1 and @carlyamarsh as clients. Thanks all!
Firstly, I wrote an article about all the tips that helped me so far (mainly from @mattgemmell and @jessicahische) https://t.co/P7fLJBfip3
🎉 It’s been a whole year since I started freelancing! 🎉 The following tweets are about this. Bear with me here…
It is HARRY BECOMES MY ALMOST NEIGHBOUR DAY. https://t.co/4RNXBWjQEg
I just published “I’ve been freelancing for a year, here are seven tips that worked for me” https://t.co/BdqS6MyIYx
It’s really hard to talk about this new Bon Iver album with people: "I like 666 upside-down t"
@walshpjames The neighbourhood warden that came round was definitely trying to hide how impressed he was.
@walshpjames I narrowly escaped an ASBO at uni when my housemates and I were singing Kiss From A Rose a little too loud late at night. Fact.
The day I forget to bring my headphones to work is also the day that the new @boniver and @ISO50 albums drop. 😐
RT @peachesanscream: I went to a Kraftwerk gig once. It was terrible. https://t.co/k1yI9luylX
@CmonHarris Oh! If I’d had known that then…
Seriously great @Edinburgh_CM talk by @janisclaxton today. Also, I ironically took ages to come up with an answer this Q… https://t.co/4GxwiXwfGR
